description: This file defines a server-side function for Next.js, specifically generating static parameters for a dynamic route segment based on 'id'. It prevents pre-rendering of dynamic pages at build time, relying on client-side navigation for data fetching.

methods.name: export default function generateStaticParams(): Array<{ id: string }> { generateStaticParams
methods.description: Returns an empty array of objects with 'id' string property, used by Next.js for static generation of dynamic pages.

ctags.name: generateStaticParams
ctags.pattern: /^export default function generateStaticParams(): Array<{ id: string }> {$/
